# UITextField.BorderStyle.bezel

**Case**

Displays a bezel-style border for the text field. This style is typically used for standard data-entry fields.

## Declaration

```swift
case bezel
```

## Constants

- **UITextField.BorderStyle.none**: The text field does not display a border.
- **UITextField.BorderStyle.line**: Displays a thin rectangle around the text field.
- **UITextField.BorderStyle.roundedRect**: Displays a rounded-style border for the text field.
